p.b: The word mine has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which mine means "belonging to the person who is speaking."

simpleChoice.p: There were still shovels and other digging tools in the woods around the old abandoned copper mine.
"The librarian is a mine of good ideas for books to read," Mrs. Smith said.
When Sabine saw the shirt her sister was wearing, she said, "Hey, that's mine!"
